nodes.title: The Path Begins
nodes.description: Your journey in the world of pool begins. Every master was once a beginner, and your path starts here.

nodes.title: First Steps to Victory
nodes.description: Your first win marks the beginning of your journey. Remember this feeling - it's the first of many.

nodes.title: Fundamentals of the Game
nodes.description: Master the basics: stance, grip, and straight shots. These fundamentals will serve as your foundation.

nodes.title: The Art of Control
nodes.description: Learn to control the cue ball. Position play is the key to consistent victory.

nodes.title: Rising Momentum
nodes.description: A string of victories shows your growing skill. Your reputation begins to grow.

nodes.title: The Apprentice's Journey
nodes.description: Your dedication has earned you the title of Apprentice. New challenges and techniques await.

nodes.title: Mastery of Spin
nodes.description: Learn the subtle art of spin control. English, draw, and follow shots become your tools.

nodes.title: The Chess Game
nodes.description: Pool is like chess - think several moves ahead. Position play becomes your strength.

nodes.title: Advanced Artistry
nodes.description: Combine spin, speed, and position into flowing patterns. Your game becomes an art form.

nodes.title: The Journeyman's Way
nodes.description: You've proven your skill and dedication. The path of the Journeyman opens before you.

nodes.title: The Tournament Circuit
nodes.description: Enter the competitive world of tournament play. Each match is a chance to prove your worth.

nodes.title: The Way of the Artist
nodes.description: Develop your own style through trick shots and creative play. Your signature moves become legendary.

nodes.title: Path to Mastery
nodes.description: Few reach this level of skill. The title of Master awaits those who prove themselves worthy.

nodes.title: Conquest of Venues
nodes.description: Travel to different venues, each with its own challenges. Leave your mark across the pool world.

nodes.title: The Perfect Game
nodes.description: Achieve perfection in your play. A perfect game is rare and beautiful.

nodes.title: The Grandmaster's Journey
nodes.description: The highest level of mastery. Few achieve this legendary status.
